question: Plan a weekend getaway to a national park, considering outdoor activities and accommodation options.
true_answer: A weekend getaway to Yellowstone National Park is planned with hiking, wildlife watching, and a stay at Old Faithful Inn.

plan.current_objective: Organize a comprehensive weekend getaway itinerary

memory_state.shared_knowledge: Yellowstone National Park offers hiking, wildlife tours; accommodation available at Old Faithful Inn.

steps.content: Plan a weekend getaway to a national park, considering outdoor activities and accommodation options.
Creating initial plan: 1) Identify suitable national parks. 2) Research outdoor activities. 3) Find accommodation options. 4) Summarize itinerary.
Decomposing task into park selection, activity research, accommodation search, and itinerary summary.
Assigning national park identification to researcher.
Searching for popular national parks with diverse activities.
Yellowstone and Yosemite are top choices with varied landscapes and activities.
Marking park identification complete. Updating shared knowledge with park options.
Assigning outdoor activity research to browser.
Exploring activities at Yellowstone like hiking, wildlife watching.
Yellowstone offers hiking trails, geysers, and wildlife tours.
Generating images and details of accommodations in Yellowstone.
Old Faithful Inn available with amenities, scenic views, historical significance.
A weekend getaway to Yellowstone National Park is planned with hiking, wildlife watching, and a stay at Old Faithful Inn.
